sentences.english: Washed by rain, the wheat field and grape trellises in front of the door beautifully shimmered with brilliant yellow and tender green.
sentences.chinese: 门前的麦垅和葡萄架子，都濯得新黄嫩绿的非常鲜丽。

sentences.english: The shore line is wooded, olive-green, a pristine cove .
sentences.chinese: 岸边一带林木蓊郁，嫩绿一片，好一个山外的小海湾。

sentences.english: It was a lovely garden, with soft green grass.
sentences.chinese: 那曾是个可爱的花园，长满了嫩绿的青草。

sentences.english: The product is green. It has soft fermented milk and spirulina taste.
sentences.chinese: 产品呈嫩绿色，具有柔和的酸奶和螺旋藻混合的香气。

sentences.english: Very pale in color with youthful green hues.
sentences.chinese: 此酒色泽淡雅，透出嫩绿色光泽。

sentences.english: He told me to look across the moor to a place which was a bright green colour.
sentences.chinese: 他让我朝沼地的尽头看以远看一处呈嫩绿色的地方。

sentences.english: The vivid green cries, with withered and yellow tears.
sentences.chinese: 嫩绿色的哭泣，枯黄的眼泪。

sentences.english: Thee trees spit green bud bud.
Spring came, with its bright green leaves and early flowers.
sentences.chinese: 春天来了，嫩绿的树叶和早开的花儿挂上了枝头。

sentences.english: The dogwood bud, pale green, is inlaid with russet markings .
sentences.chinese: 山茱萸嫩绿色的花蕾镶嵌上了红褐色的印迹。

sentences.english: The hills and grass are green. Trees have new green leaves.
sentences.chinese: 山青了，小草变绿了，树枝上发出了嫩绿色的芽。

sentences.english: Perhaps to be outdone, jujube scrambling to spit the verdant shoots.
sentences.chinese: 也许是不甘落后，枣树争先恐后地吐出了嫩绿的新芽。

sentences.english: Light green buds sprout from the trees in spring.
sentences.chinese: 春天，万木长出了嫩绿的新芽。

sentences.english: Or the vivid green field holds up the bright blue sky.
sentences.chinese: 还是嫩绿的大地擎拖着蔚蓝的天空。

definition: verdant/lush green and full of life
